response.summary: The ABC News website provides comprehensive news coverage, including local, national, and international stories, along with various sections dedicated to politics, business, sports, science, health, entertainment, and lifestyle.

keyContent.name: Just In
keyContent.description: Latest breaking news stories and updates.

keyContent.name: Watch Live
keyContent.description: Live streaming of news coverage and events.

keyContent.name: Politics
keyContent.description: Coverage of political news, analysis, and opinion.

keyContent.name: World
keyContent.description: International news stories and global events.

keyContent.name: Business
keyContent.description: News related to the economy, markets, and business developments.

keyContent.name: Analysis
keyContent.description: In-depth analysis and opinion pieces on current issues.

keyContent.name: Sport
keyContent.description: Latest sports news, events, and analysis.

keyContent.name: Science
keyContent.description: News and features on scientific discoveries and research.

keyContent.name: Entertainment
keyContent.description: News on movies, music, and cultural events.

keyContent.name: Lifestyle
keyContent.description: Features on lifestyle topics, including food, travel, and wellness.

keyContent.name: Fact Check
keyContent.description: Verification of claims and statements made in public discourse.

keyContent.name: Other
keyContent.description: Additional news and features not categorized elsewhere.

nextActions: Explore the latest news in the 'Just In' section for breaking updates.
Watch live news coverage to stay informed about current events.
Visit the 'Politics' section to read about the latest political developments.

metadata.title: ABC News - Read the Latest News & HeadlinesiviewListen
metadata.description: Read the latest news headlines and in-depth analysis from an independent and trusted source. Check the latest news on business, sports, weather, and more.
